english.segment1: One day youve got me laughing. One day youve got me crying. One day youve got me thinking. Im going out of my mind. But one thing is true. The one thing that never changes. Is that youve always got me
english.segment2: CHORUS: On a Monday, on a Tuesday, on a Wednesday. All the way around til Sunday. Youve always got me on the good days. And the bad days and the mad days. The happy and the sad days. Youve got me every day of my life
english.segment3: One night youve got candles burning. One night your head is aching. Most nights youve got several hundred things. Still on your list to get done. But one thing stays true. One thing you can know for certain. Is that youve always got me
english.segment5: Youve always got me. Youve always got me by your side. Youve always got me. Every single day of my life. Youve always got me. Youve always got me by your side. Youve always got me
english.segment6: One thing stays true. Theres one thing you can know for certain. Is that youve always got me
